item.title: 台币期权交易低迷提升保险公司对冲成本
item.description: 台币汇率的波动削弱了在离岸市场交易台币衍生品的热情，使岛内保险公司对冲其巨额美元资产的成本增加。【原文：Gyrations in the Taiwanese dollar have dented appetite for trading its derivatives in offshore markets, making it costlier for the island’s insurers to hedge their massive dollar assets.】

item.title: 地缘政治和贸易紧张局势加剧，黄金飙升为避风港助力
item.description: 由于地缘政治和贸易紧张局势加剧，避险资产需求回升，黄金在上周下跌 2% 后出现上涨。【原文：Gold rose — after falling by 2% last week - as an increase in geopolitical and trade tensions revived demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔勾勒今年晚些时候降息路径
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，由于他预计关税将提高失业率并暂时加剧通胀，他仍然认为今年晚些时候有可能降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he continues to see a path to interest-rate cuts later this year amid his expectations that tariffs will boost unemployment and temporarily increase inflation.】

item.title: 日本企业在美国加征关税前提高资本支出
item.description: 今年第一季度，日本企业加快了资本投资的增长速度，而此时特朗普政府正在吹嘘即将于 3 月份启动的关税行动。【原文：Japanese businesses increased capital investment at a faster pace in the first quarter of this year just as the Trump administration touted the coming tariff campaign that kicked off in March.】

item.title: 民族主义者在投票中遥遥领先，振兴波兰的资产岌岌可危
item.description: 波兰股票和债券是 2025 年全球表现最出色的股票和债券之一，由于预计一名民族主义者将在总统选举中获胜，对亲欧洲的政府造成打击，波兰股票和债券的投资者正处于紧张状态。【原文：Investors in Polish stocks and bonds — among the world’s stand-out performers of 2025 — are on edge as a nationalist is projected to win presidential elections, dealing a blow to the pro-European government.】

item.title: Soul Patts 和 Brickworks 在共同拥有 56 年后合并
item.description: 澳大利亚投资公司 Washington H. Soul Pattinson and Co. 和 Brickworks Ltd. 同意合并，最终简化了两家公司之间长达近 60 年的交叉持股关系。【原文：Australian investment firm Washington H. Soul Pattinson and Co. and Brickworks Ltd. agreed to combine, finally simplifying a cross-shareholding between the two businesses that stretches back almost 60 years.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯通过推动石油激增加强对欧佩克+的控制
item.description: 六年前，当阿卜杜勒阿齐兹-本-萨勒曼王子被任命为沙特阿拉伯能源部长时，他发誓要听从欧佩克+国家中最小国家的意见。但在本周末的卡特尔会议上，即使是最强大的成员国也无法阻止利雅得的图谋。【原文：When Prince Abdulaziz bin Salman was appointed Saudi Arabia’s energy minister six years ago, he vowed to heed even the smallest of OPEC+ nations. But at the cartel’s meeting this weekend, even the most powerful members couldn’t block Riyadh’s designs.】

item.title: 英国非户籍人口退出率至少达到 10%，未来还会更多
item.description: 前财政部经济学家撰写的一份新报告显示，在首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党政府出台更严格的税收规定后，英国至少有 10% 的非家庭富裕人口离开了英国。【原文：At least 10% of the UK’s wealthy non-dom population have left the country following tighter tax rules introduced by Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s Labour government, according to a new report authored by a former Treasury economist.】

item.title: 三星即将与珀莱雅就人工智能功能达成广泛协议
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）即将达成一项范围广泛的交易，投资 Perplexity AI 公司，并将这家人工智能初创公司的搜索技术应用到这家韩国公司的设备中。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is nearing a wide-ranging deal to invest in Perplexity AI Inc. and put search technology from the artificial intelligence startup at the forefront of the South Korean company’s devices.】

item.title: 韩国大选的领跑者仍让许多人无法信服
item.description: 李在明仍然是韩国总统竞选中的领跑者，但曾经看似压倒性的胜利已经变成了一场更加激烈的竞争。【原文：Lee Jae-myung is still the frontrunner in South Korea’s presidential race, but what once looked like a landslide victory has turned into a much closer contest.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，美国期货下滑，原油大涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对进口钢铁和铝加征双倍关税后，亚洲市场谨慎开盘。石油攀升约 2%，原因是供应进一步增加，而地缘政治风险加剧。【原文：Asian markets are poised for a cautious open after US President Donald Trump said he would double tariffs on steel and aluminum imports. Oil climbed around 2% as a further supply boost vied with heightened geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"供应增加与地缘政治风险相抗衡，石油价格上涨
item.description: 由于欧佩克+连续第三次增产，加上乌克兰和伊朗地缘政治风险加剧，石油价格上涨。【原文：Oil gained as a third straight production increase by OPEC+ vied with heightened geopolitical risk in Ukraine and Iran.】

item.title: 任天堂在日本销售 Switch 2 的明智计划
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）在日本的 Switch 2 经销方面采取了一项不同寻常的举措：它设定了批发价格，这样零售商就能从每次销售中赚取更多利润。【原文：Nintendo Co. is making an unusual move with its Switch 2 distribution in Japan: It’s setting wholesale prices so retailers can earn more from each sale.】

item.title: 华氏 158 度的高温预示着从中国到美国的炎热夏季
item.description:
未来几个月的酷热天气可能会给电网带来压力，使农作物枯萎，并造成数十亿美元的经济损失。【原文：

Extreme heat in the coming months threatens to tax power grids, wilt crops and inflict billions of dollars in economic losses.

】

item.title: 仅 20 位分析师的 3,000 多笔私人信贷交易引发华尔街质疑
item.description:
一家小评级公司称，它是市场上最多产的私人信贷评级机构。业内人士担心麻烦正在酝酿之中。【原文：

A tiny ratings firm says it’s the market's most prolific grader of private credit. Industry insiders worry trouble is brewing.

】

item.title: 出口民调显示华沙亲欧盟市长在波兰投票中领先
item.description: 出口民调显示，华沙的中间派市长在波兰总统选举中以微弱优势领先于唐纳德-特朗普支持的民族主义候选人，为波兰亲欧盟的政府打了一支强心针。【原文：The centrist mayor of Warsaw took a slim lead in Poland’s presidential election over a nationalist candidate backed by Donald Trump, giving a boost to the country’s pro-European Union government, exit polls show.】

item.title: 国债交易员等待劳工数据触发利率变动
item.description: 债券投资者正在关注包括 5 月份就业报告在内的一系列劳动力市场指标，以帮助确定国债收益率和美联储利率政策的下一步变化。【原文：Bond investors are looking to a slew of labor-market indicators — including the May employment report — for help in determining the next shifts in Treasury yields and the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 萨默斯、伯南克忆费舍尔为杰出经济学者
item.description: 斯坦利-费舍尔（Stanley Fischer）作为世界各地经济界名人的导师，于周日受到缅怀。【原文：Stanley Fischer was remembered Sunday as a mentor to economic luminaries around the world.】

item.title: 秘鲁利马 5 月通胀指数意外下降
item.description: 秘鲁首都的通货膨胀率在 5 月份略有下降，出乎经济学家的意料，他们原本预测会略有上升。【原文：Inflation in Peru’s capital fell slightly in the month of May, surprising economists who were forecasting a small increase.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克领导人排除了对卡齐米尔重返州长职位的支持
item.description: 斯洛伐克领导人罗伯特-菲佐周日表示，总理罗伯特-菲佐将不会支持重新任命彼得-卡齐米尔为斯洛伐克央行行长。【原文：Prime Minister Robert Fico will not support the reappointment of Peter Kazimir as head of Slovakia’s central bank, the Slovak leader said on Sunday.】

item.title: 利润引擎嗡嗡作响，大型科技公司重回 S&P 500 指数驾驶席
item.description: 4 月份曾将标准普尔 500 指数拖入熊市边缘的科技巨头们，正在为美国股市的复苏提供一些动力。【原文：The same technology giants that helped drag the S&P 500 to the brink of a bear market in April are giving the recovery in US equities some legs.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国绝不会违约，国会面临最后期限
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，随着提高联邦债务上限的最后期限日益临近，美国 "绝不会违约"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the US “is never going to default” as the deadline for increasing the federal debt ceiling gets closer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行降息后澳大利亚房价继续攀升
item.description: 澳大利亚房价连续第四个月攀升，原因是该国央行第二次降息，而且预计今年晚些时候还会有更多降息。【原文：Australian home prices climbed for a fourth straight month, driven by a second interest rate cut by the country’s central bank and expectations more will follow later this year.】

item.title: 台湾中央银行警告出口商防范货币投机
item.description: 台湾中央银行加强了对当地贸易公司购汇行为的警告，以再次抑制外汇市场的投机行为，维护台币的稳定。【原文：Taiwan’s Central Bank strengthened its warning to local trading companies over their currency purchases as it seeks once again to tamp down speculation on foreign exchange markets and maintain the stability of the Taiwan dollar.】

item.title: 墨西哥从数十名鲜为人知的候选人中选出法官
item.description: 墨西哥选民将于周日前往投票站开始挑选法官，这是一次史无前例的选举，总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）可能会对改革后的司法机构产生广泛影响，而司法机构是她的政党唯一没有控制的政府部门。【原文：Mexican voters head to the polls on Sunday to begin picking judges in an unprecedented election that could give President Claudia Sheinbaum broad influence over a revamped judiciary, the only branch of government her party doesn’t control.】

item.title: 新兴货币反弹，套利交易重获青睐
item.description: 随着有迹象表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普激进的关税政策可能不会全面实施，货币波动性减弱，新兴市场利差交易再次起飞。【原文：Emerging market carry trades are taking off again, as currency volatility subsides amid signs President Donald Trump’s aggressive tariffs may not get fully enacted.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯境内四个军用机场
item.description: 据乌克兰安全局的一名消息人士称，乌克兰无人机周日袭击了数个俄罗斯军用机场，其中包括位于西伯利亚东部深处的贝拉亚军事基地。【原文：Ukrainian drones hit several Russian military airfields Sunday, including Belaya military base deep in eastern Siberia, according to a source with Ukraine’s Security Service.】

item.title: 苹果开发者大会将显示其离成为人工智能领导者还很远
item.description: 苹果公司在首次推出人工智能平台一年后，在 WWDC 大会上几乎没有表现出追赶 OpenAI 和谷歌等领先企业的态势。还有：最新的 macOS 采用了全新的加利福尼亚主题；了解苹果公司为什么要改用 iOS 26 和 macOS 26 命名系统；以及苹果公司专用游戏应用程序的详细信息。【原文：Apple, a year after debuting its AI platform, will do little at WWDC to show it’s catching up to leaders like OpenAI and Google. Also: The latest macOS gets its new California theme; a look at why the company is moving to an iOS 26 and macOS 26 naming system; and details on Apple’s dedicated gaming app.】

item.title: IndiGo 与达美航空公司、法荷航空公司和维珍航空公司结盟，推进全球发展
item.description: 经营 IndiGo 的 InterGlobe 航空公司宣布与达美航空、法荷航和维珍大西洋航空达成代码共享协议，印度市场的领导者加倍努力扩大其全球影响力。【原文：InterGlobe Aviation, which operates IndiGo, announced a codesharing pact with Delta Air Lines Inc., Air France-KLM and Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd. as the India market leader doubles down on expanding its global reach.】

item.title: 乌克兰在计划会谈前面临俄罗斯的持续炮击
item.description: 在基辅和莫斯科计划于本周举行会谈之前，乌克兰于周日早些时候遭到了俄罗斯导弹和无人机最长时间的袭击，空中警报持续了 9 个多小时。【原文：Ukraine came under one of the longest barrages from Russian missiles and drones early Sunday, with air sirens lasting for more then 9 hours, ahead of planned talks between Kyiv and Moscow this week.】
